title: A Nice Group Of T206 w/ HOF and Rare Backs
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: A Nice Group Of T206 w/ HOF and Rare Backs
posts.post_content:
Greetings. I have a group of quality T206 that I am looking to sell or possibly trade. If you are interested, please let me know and I will provide you with front and back scans.

Many Thanks.

Derek


Lenox

Al Bridwell "portrait, with cap" (PSA 2)


American Beauty 

{350 - framed} Miller Huggins (HOF) "hands at mouth" (PSA 3)

{350 - no frame} Sam Crawford (HOF) "with bat" (SGC 3) 

{460} Zack Wheat (HOF, RC) (PSA 3)

{460} Hughie Jennings (HOF) "both hands show" (raw, est. fair-good condition) 

{460} Orval Overall "hands at face" (SGC 1.5)


Piedmont

Willie Keeler (HOF) "portrait" (SGC 3) 

Hal Chase "portrait-pink" (SGC 2) 

Roger Bresnahan (HOF) "portrait" (SGC A - slight trim, but looks NM+)


El Principe De Gales

Addie Joss (HOF) "pitching" (SGC 1 - pin hole)


Tolstoi

Miller Huggins (HOF) "hands at mouth" (PSA 3)
What is your asking price for this lot?

Hello. 

I was able to find a couple of nice matches with fellow board members over the last week+, and it is my hope to keep it going.

I just wanted to do a friendly thread "bump" and see if there were not more matches to be made.

Thank you much.

Derek
